privacy:
Privacy Policy

Last updated: February 2026

1. Information We Collect
We collect information you provide directly, such as email address, username, nickname, and profile details, as well as service usage records.

2. How We Use Information
Collected information is used to provide the Service, generate AI-based summaries, and improve user experience.

3. AI Data Processing
Your entries are sent to OpenAI for AI features including summary generation, todo extraction, and conversational check-ins. OpenAI does not use API data for model training. We do not use your data to train any AI models.

4. Data Storage
Data is stored on Cloudflare (D1 database and R2 storage) with industry-standard encryption and access controls.

5. Data Sharing
We do not share personal information with third parties without your explicit consent, except as described in this policy (OpenAI for AI processing, Cloudflare for hosting, Resend for transactional emails) or when required by law.

6. Your Rights
You may request access to, correction of, or deletion of your data at any time. You can export all your data or delete your account from the Settings screen.

7. Communications
We send transactional emails for account verification, password reset, and service notifications. We may send promotional or informational emails in the future; you will always be able to opt out.

8. Cookies and Analytics
We may use cookies and collect anonymized usage statistics to improve the Service. If we do, we will update this policy accordingly.

9. Security
We apply industry-standard security measures including encrypted storage, secure authentication, and regular access reviews to protect your data.

10. Contact
For privacy-related inquiries, please contact support@miriel.app.
